WorkItem.ClosedComment: Currently there is no way to do this in a way that is efficient enough for practical purposes. As a result I have changed Arcane Light setting to be enabled by default. I haven't found any case so far where Arcane Light would produce suboptimal results so there should be no disadvantage from doing this, only better performance. If you want to do more advanced analysis with all possible cycles I would suggest to use cooldown segmentation.
WorkItem.Description: I keep getting very strange results with the new rawr version , dunno what I am doing wrong pls help.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] Arcane Maxes Mastery but way too Low on Hit when Optimizing

Comments.Message: Somehow this specific gear setting triggers some very bad conditions for the arcane solver. I'm not sure if I'll be able to fix it, but there is a workaround. I would suggest you either select Arcane Light option under advanced setting or check Disable Mana Regen Cycles under Spells & Buffs. Either of those should fix your problem. In addition I would suggest to keep Max Use Assumption checked under advanced options.
